loginDescription: Shyiramo umwirondoro wawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira mu gice cy'ubuyobozi.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'ubuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa hose muri sisitemu mu kumenya niba umunyeshuri yatsinze cyangwa yatsinzwe.
themeDescription: Uburyo bw'umwijima bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe agashushanyo k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe w'urupapuro.
notificationsDescription: Amatangazo kuri email ku byabaye muri sisitemu ateganyijwe mu gihe kizaza.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Ibyiyongereyeho nk'uburyo bwo kohereza amakuru muri PDF/Excel, igenamiterere rirambuye rya raporo, n'uburyo bwo gutumanaho (SMS/email) biteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza. Ubu, kohereza muri CSV bitanga amakuru y'ibanze.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho amategeko rusange ya sisitemu n'amakuru y'ishuri.
authenticationRequired: Ugomba kuba winjiye kugira ngo ukore iki gikorwa.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo wemerewe guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
languageSettingsDescription: Hitamo ururimi ukunda ruzajya rugaragara muri porogaramu.
platformGoalEN: A smart education platform for managing student grades, attendance, and communication with parents — making the teacher’s work easier and more effective.
platformGoalRW: Urubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rufasha mu gucunga amanota y’abanyeshuri, imyitwarire, no gutumanaho n’ababyeyi — koroshya akazi k’umwarimu.
platformGoalFR: Une plateforme intelligente pour gérer les notes, la présence des élèves et communiquer avec les parents — facilitant le travail des enseignants.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Bika kandi ucunge neza amanota y'abanyeshuri.
featureReportCardsDesc: Kora mu buryo bwikora indangamanota zirambuye z'abanyeshuri.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Ohereza amanota n'amakuru ku babyeyi ukoresheje SMS/Email (bizaza).
featureAssignmentsDesc: Tanga kandi ukurikirane imikoro n'imishinga y'abanyeshuri.
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Bika amafoto y'abanyeshuri n'izindi nyandiko zibareba mu mutekano.
featureCommunicationDesc: Koroshya itumanaho hagati y'abarimu n'ubuyobozi bw'ishuri.
